<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/container-svc/image/{imageName}/pullable"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Check if an image exists on in the container registry and is pullable.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Image name","in":"path","name":"imageName","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"pullable":{"type":"boolean"}},"required":["pullable"],"type":"object","title":"container_svc.ImagePullableResponse"}}},"description":"OK"},"400":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"container_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"model ID in path is not URL encoded"},"401":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"container_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"unauthorized"},"500":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"container_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"internal server error"}}}
